means: （公共汽车和列车等的）常规路线

sameAnalysis.word_list: path, road, way, street, highway, avenue, motorway, route, lane, pavement, trail
means: path ： 多指由人或动物在田间、小丘或树丛中经常走动而踩出的小路，也指公园或花园等供人走的小径。
road ： 指连接两地间供行人或车辆使用的广阔平坦的大道，多指公路，也可用于引申意义。
way ： 普通用词，含义广泛，可指各种路、道或通道，也可指抽象的道路。
street ： 尤指城市中的道路，往往一侧或两侧有高大建筑物；还可指城市小镇、近郊可供人、车、马行走的平坦道路。
highway ： 通常指市区外可以通行各种机动车辆的交通干线。
avenue ： 在美国，指城市中一侧或两侧建筑物林立的大道或马路；而在英国则常指通住乡村大住宅、私人大庄园或两旁栽树的道路。
motorway ： 高速公路，新词，特指为车辆快速通行而修的专线，美语为freeway或expressway。
route ： 指从此处通往彼处的路线、路程等。
lane ： 指农村或城镇的小道或小径，也指小巷。
pavement ： 在英国，多指街道两旁的人行道，而美国人常用sidewlk表示人行道。
trail ： 指人或兽在森林、荒野或山中踩出的小径或崎岖小道。

word_mean: 网络信息从信源到信宿的路径。

sentence.Network_cn: 船夫选择的路线会随水位的变化而有所不同。

sentence.Network_en: It was even marked on the map as a scenic route.
sentence.Network_cn: 它甚至还作为观光路线标在了地图上。

sentence.Network_en: Tens of thousands lined the route from Dublin airport.
sentence.Network_cn: 从都柏林机场出来的道路两边站着数万人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French rute 'road', from Latin rupta (via) 'broken (way'), feminine past participle of rumpere

encyclopedia.content: Route就是用来显示、人工添加和修改路由表项目的。大多数主机一般都是驻留在只连接一台路由器的网段上。由于只有一台路由器，因此不存在使用哪一台路由器将数据包发表到远程计算机上去的问题，该路由器的IP地址可作为该网段上所有计算机的缺省网关来输入。 但是，当网络上拥有两个或多个路由器时，你就不一定想只依赖缺省网关了。实际上你可能想让你的某些远程IP地址通过某个特定的路由器来传递，而其他的远程IP则通过另一个路由器来传递。

entry.def: A route is a way from one place to another.

example.ex: ...the most direct route to the town centre...
example.tran: 到市中心最直接的路线

example.ex: All escape routes were blocked by armed police...
example.tran: 所有逃跑的路都被武警封锁了。

entry.def: A bus, air, or shipping route is the way between two places along which buses, planes, or ships travel regularly.

example.tran: 去往日本的主要航运线路

entry.def: In the United States, Route is used in front of a number in the names of main roads between major cities.

example.tran: 580号公路的百老汇－韦伯斯特出口

entry.def: Your route is the series of visits you make to different people or places, as part of your job.

example.ex: He began cracking open big blue tins of butter cookies and feeding the dogs on his route...
example.tran: 他打开装黄油饼干的蓝色大罐子，开始沿路给狗喂食。

example.ex: They would go out on his route and check him.
example.tran: 他们会到他那里走访一下，看看他的情况。

entry.def: You can refer to a way of achieving something as a route .

example.ex: Researchers are trying to get at the same information through an indirect route...
example.tran: 研究人员正试图通过间接的途径获得相同的信息。

example.ex: Buying the best is as sure a route to success in investment as in any other field.
example.tran: 和其他领域一样，投资领域获得成功的途径也是买进最佳商品。

entry.tran: 按特定路线发送(车辆、货物或乘客)
entry.def: If vehicles, goods, or passengers are routed in a particular direction, they are made to travel in that direction.

example.ex: Double-stack trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks...
example.tran: 以往由卡车运送的很多货物现在都改用双层列车运送了。

example.ex: Approaching cars will be routed into two lanes.
example.tran: 驶来的车辆会分流到两条车道。

entry.tran: 以…线路发送(电话或其他电子信号)
entry.def: If telephone calls or other electronic signals are routed in a particular way, the signals are sent through a particular series of connections.

example.ex: ...plans to route every emergency call in Britain through just three telephone exchanges.
example.tran: 只通过3次电话转接来传送英国境内所有紧急呼叫的计划

entry.tran: 在途中，沿途(在不规范英语中有时拼作on route)
entry.def: En route to a place means on the way to that place. En route is sometimes spelled on toute in non-standard English.

example.ex: They have arrived in London en route to the United States...
example.tran: 他们已经到达伦敦，正在前往美国的途中。

example.ex: One of the bags was lost en route.
example.tran: 其中一个包在途中丢失了。

entry.tran: （新闻用语）作为（较长进程）的一部分，在…之前
entry.def: Journalists sometimes use en route when they are mentioning an event that happened as part of a longer process or before another event.

example.ex: The German set three tournament records and equalled two others en route to grabbing golf's richest prize.
example.tran: 那个德国人在获得高尔夫球赛最高奖金的同时刷新了3项锦标赛纪录，平了其他两项纪录。

entry.tran: 把事情进行到底;贯彻始终
entry.def: If you go the route, you do something fully or continue with a task until you have completely finished.

example.ex: They have gone the route, in many cases, of just big — big bowls, big statues, big masks, big everything.
example.tran: 在很多情况下，他们从头到尾都只做大的东西——大碗，大雕像，大面具，所有东西都是大的。

means.word_mean: 1. an established line of travel or access
2. an open way (generally public) for travel or transportation
1. send documents or materials to appropriate destinations

means.word_mean: 路, 路途, 路线, 路程

sentences.en: The climbers tried to find a new route to the top of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 登山者试图寻出一条通到山顶的新路。

sentences.en: It's the quickest route to Europe.
sentences.cn: 这是去欧洲最快的路线。

jushi.english: The climbers tried to find a new route to the top of the mountain.
jushi.chinese: 登山者试图寻出一条通到山顶的新路。

jushi.english: Because of its position on a water route, the village soon became a river-traffic center.
jushi.chinese: 由于处在水路位置,该村很快变成了河上交通中心。

jushi.english: It's the quickest route to Europe.
jushi.chinese: 这是去欧洲最快的路线。
